text: St. Michael's Church (French: L'église Saint-Michel, Chinese:圣弥厄尔教堂), also called Dongjiaoming Street Church (东交民巷天主堂), is a church that was formerly in the French Legation of Beijing. It was built in 1901. ==References== Category:French diaspora in Asia Category:Roman Catholic churches in Beijing
title: St. Michael's Church, Beijing
